problem_data.title: Goat Latin
problem_data.description:
You are given a string sentence that consist of words separated by spaces. Each word consists of lowercase and uppercase letters only.

We would like to convert the sentence to "Goat Latin" (a made-up language similar to Pig Latin.) The rules of Goat Latin are as follows:

If a word begins with a vowel ('a', 'e', 'i', 'o', or 'u'), append "ma" to the end of the word.
For example, the word "apple" becomes "applema".
If a word begins with a consonant (i.e., not a vowel), remove the first letter and append it to the end, then add "ma".
For example, the word "goat" becomes "oatgma".
Add one letter 'a' to the end of each word per its word index in the sentence, starting with 1.
For example, the first word gets "a" added to the end, the second word gets "aa" added to the end, and so on.
Return the final sentence representing the conversion from sentence to Goat Latin.

examples.input: sentence = "The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog"
examples.output: "heTmaa uickqmaaa rownbmaaaa oxfmaaaaa umpedjmaaaaaa overmaaaaaaa hetmaaaaaaaa azylmaaaaaaaaa ogdmaaaaaaaaaa"

parsed_tests: ('toGoatLatin', ('I speak Goat Latin\n',), 'Imaa peaksmaaa oatGmaaaa atinLmaaaaa\n')
('toGoatLatin', ('I am an AI\n',), 'Imaa ammaaa anmaaaa AImaaaaa\n')
experiment_result.runlog:
[測試#1] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: toGoatLatin('I speak Goat Latin\n',)
  標準輸出: 'Imaa peaksmaaa oatGmaaaa atinLmaaaaa\n'
  你的輸出: 'Imaa peaksmaaa oatGmaaaa atinLmaaaaa'

[測試#2] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: toGoatLatin('apple\n',)
  標準輸出: 'applemaa\n'
  你的輸出: 'applemaa'

[測試#3] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: toGoatLatin('banana\n',)
  標準輸出: 'ananabmaa\n'
  你的輸出: 'ananabmaa'

  標準輸出: 'Amaa\n'
  你的輸出: 'Amaa'

[測試#5] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: toGoatLatin('b\n',)
  標準輸出: 'bmaa\n'
  你的輸出: 'bmaa'

[測試#6] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: toGoatLatin('I am an AI\n',)
  標準輸出: 'Imaa ammaaa anmaaaa AImaaaaa\n'
  你的輸出: 'Imaa ammaaa anmaaaa AImaaaaa'

[測試#7] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: toGoatLatin('Hello World\n',)
  標準輸出: 'elloHmaa orldWmaaa\n'
  你的輸出: 'elloHmaa orldWmaaa'

[測試#8] ❌ 執行例外: 'tuple' object has no attribute 'split'
[測試#9] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: toGoatLatin('Go  to  school\n',)
  標準輸出: 'oGmaa otmaaa hoolscmaaaa\n'
  你的輸出: 'oGmaa otmaaa choolsmaaaa'

[測試#10] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: toGoatLatin('Umbrella Python\n',)
  標準輸出: 'Umbrellamaa ythonPmaa\n'
